alert.note: Alert for Butler (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued May 09 at 5:30PM CDT until May 09 at 6:00PM CDT by NWS Wichita
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 545 PM CDT FOR COWLEY...SOUTHEASTERN BUTLER...SUMNER AND NORTHWESTERN CHAUTAUQUA COUNTIES... At 529 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 6 miles southeast of Latham to near Udall to near Viola, moving southeast at 10 mph. Damaging winds are possible far beyond the area of precipitation, and along the leading gust front. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Arkansas City, Winfield, Wellington, Douglass, Belle Plaine, Conway Springs, Caldwell, Oxford, Udall, Cedar Vale, Burden, Argonia, South Haven, Dexter, Atlanta, Geuda Springs, Latham, Rock, Mayfield and Cambridge. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
